item.title: Faster golang builds
item.description: I’ve been hacking in golang since before version 1.4, and the speed at which my builds finished has been mostly trending downwards. Let’s look into the reasons and some fixes. TL;DR click-bait title: “Get 4x faster golang builds with this one trick!”. Here are the three reasons my builds got slower: The compiler Before version 1.5, the compiler was written in C but with that release, it moved to being pure golang.
